name: consumed to 1
description:
A short puzzlescript game about blocks consuming each other. With the goal being to only have 1 block left.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=fc976d3a81e73f94cc4fa41dd6400afb

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=fc976d3a81e73f94cc4fa41dd6400afb
